alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Norman; Pennington; Red Lake; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 3:02AM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to three tenths of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...West Polk, Norman, Pennington, Red Lake and East Polk Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There remains uncertainty with how much ice will accumulate, and where the greatest impacts will occur.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Norman; Pennington; Red Lake; West Polk
